author: dmitrijus
body:
This has been open for over a year, DQM needs this and we have been running it forever.
It should go to the release.

The PR allows the DQM module DQMProvInfo (run by central online DQM) to retrieve the beam information from TCDS FED raw data, by reading the corresponding address for the Beam Synchronous Timing (BST) record. This is currently done using an utility in EventFilter/Utilities, which has been enhanced for this scope.
From this information, the Physics Declared bit is computed, and added into the report summary profile.
NOTA BENE: this is a temporary solution, until a well implemented unpacker for TCDS is made available in CMSSW.

The PR also resurrects a MonitorElement in DQMEventInfo showing the HLT path selection in the DQM input source DQMStreamerReader.
title: Revive beam information, physics declared bit, and HLT event selection for online DQM
